AuthenticationSchemeReference.description: Specifies the authentication scheme to be used for authentication.

inputs.description: Gets or sets the key and value of the fields used for authentication.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of authentication scheme of an endpoint.

AuthorizationHeader.description: Represents the header of the REST request.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of authorization header.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of authorization header.

displayName.description: Display name of azure management group

tenantId.description: Id of tenant from which azure management group belogs

errorMessage.description: Error message in case of an exception

values.description: Indicates whether user does not have required permissions to register the app in Entra or WIF is disabled.

ClientCertificate.description: Specifies the client certificate to be used for the endpoint request.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of client certificate.

DataSource.description: Specifies the data sources for this endpoint.

authenticationScheme.description: Gets or sets the authentication scheme for the endpoint request.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Gets or sets the pagination format supported by this data source(ContinuationToken/SkipTop).

callbackRequiredTemplate.description: Gets or sets the template to check if subsequent call is needed.

endpointUrl.description: Gets or sets the endpoint url of the data source.

headers.description: Gets or sets the authorization headers of the request.

initialContextTemplate.description: Gets or sets the initial value of the query params.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the data source.

requestContent.description: Gets or sets the request content of the endpoint request.

requestVerb.description: Gets or sets the request method of the endpoint request.

resourceUrl.description: Gets or sets the resource url of the endpoint request.

resultSelector.description: Gets or sets the result selector to filter the response of the endpoint request.

DataSourceBinding.description: Represents the data source binding of the endpoint.

DataSourceBindingBase.description: Represents binding of data source for the service endpoint request.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Pagination format supported by this data source(ContinuationToken/SkipTop).

dataSourceName.description: Gets or sets the name of the data source.

endpointId.description: Gets or sets the endpoint Id.

endpointUrl.description: Gets or sets the url of the service endpoint.

headers.description: Gets or sets the authorization headers.

initialContextTemplate.description: Defines the initial value of the query params

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters for the data source.

requestContent.description: Gets or sets http request body

requestVerb.description: Gets or sets http request verb

resultSelector.description: Gets or sets the result selector.

resultTemplate.description: Gets or sets the result template.

target.description: Gets or sets the target of the data source.

DataSourceDetails.description: Represents details of the service endpoint data source.

dataSourceName.description: Gets or sets the data source name.

dataSourceUrl.description: Gets or sets the data source url.

headers.description: Gets or sets the request headers.

initialContextTemplate.description: Gets or sets the initialization context used for the initial call to the data source

parameters.description: Gets the parameters of data source.

requestContent.description: Gets or sets the data source request content.

requestVerb.description: Gets or sets the data source request verb. Get/Post are the only implemented types

resourceUrl.description: Gets or sets the resource url of data source.

resultSelector.description: Gets or sets the result selector.

DependencyBinding.description: Represents the details of the input on which a given input is dependent.

key.description: Gets or sets the value of the field on which url is dependent.

value.description: Gets or sets the corresponding value of url.

DependencyData.description: Represents the dependency data for the endpoint inputs.

input.description: Gets or sets the category of dependency data.

map.description: Gets or sets the key-value pair to specify properties and their values.

DependsOn.description: Represents the inputs on which any given input is dependent.

input.description: Gets or sets the ID of the field on which URL's value is dependent.

map.description: Gets or sets key-value pair containing other's field value and corresponding url value.

EndpointAuthorization.description: Represents the authorization used for service endpoint.

parameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters for the selected authorization scheme.

scheme.description: Gets or sets the scheme used for service endpoint authentication.

EndpointUrl.description: Represents url of the service endpoint.

dependsOn.description: Gets or sets the dependency bindings.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name of service endpoint url.

format.description: Gets or sets the format of the url.

helpText.description: Gets or sets the help text of service endpoint url.

isVisible.description: Gets or sets the visibility of service endpoint url.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of service endpoint url.

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

HelpLink.description: Specifies the public url of the help documentation.

text.description: Gets or sets the help text.

url.description: Gets or sets the public url of the help documentation.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

dependencyInputIds.description: The ids of all inputs that the value of this input is dependent on.

description.description: Description of what this input is used for

groupName.description: The group localized name to which this input belongs and can be shown as a header for the container that will include all the inputs in the group.

hasDynamicValueInformation.description: If true, the value information for this input is dynamic and should be fetched when the value of dependency inputs change.

inputMode.description: Mode in which the value of this input should be entered

values.description: This input should not be shown in the UI
An input text box should be shown
An password input box should be shown
A select/combo control should be shown
Checkbox should be shown(for true/false values)
A multi-line text area should be shown

isConfidential.description: Gets whether this input is confidential, such as for a password or application key

name.description: Localized name which can be shown as a label for the subscription input

properties.description: Custom properties for the input which can be used by the service provider

type.description: Underlying data type for the input value. When this value is specified, InputMode, Validation and Values are optional.

useInDefaultDescription.description: Gets whether this input is included in the default generated action description.

validation.description: Information to use to validate this input's value

valueHint.description: A hint for input value. It can be used in the UI as the input placeholder.

values.description: Information about possible values for this input

InputValidation.description: Describes what values are valid for a subscription input

dataType.description: Gets or sets the data type to validate.

values.description: Represents a value of true or false.

isRequired.description: Gets or sets if this is a required field.

maxLength.description: Gets or sets the maximum length of this descriptor.

maxValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

minLength.description: Gets or sets the minimum length of this descriptor.

minValue.description: Gets or sets the minimum value for this descriptor.

pattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

patternMismatchErrorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error on pattern mismatch.

patternMismatchWarningMessage.description: Gets or sets the warning on pattern mismatch.

warningPattern.description: Gets or sets the pattern to validate.

InputValue.description: Information about a single value for an input

data.description: Any other data about this input

displayValue.description: The text to show for the display of this value

value.description: The value to store for this input

InputValues.description: Information about the possible/allowed values for a given subscription input

defaultValue.description: The default value to use for this input

error.description: Errors encountered while computing dynamic values.

isLimitedToPossibleValues.description: Should the value be restricted to one of the values in the PossibleValues (True) or are the values in PossibleValues just a suggestion (False)

isReadOnly.description: Should this input be made read-only

possibleValues.description: Possible values that this input can take

InputValuesError.description: Error information related to a subscription input value.

type.description: Gets the node type for this JToken.

first.description: Get the first child token of this token.

hasValues.description: Gets a value indicating whether this token has child tokens.

last.description: Get the last child token of this token.

next.description: Gets the next sibling token of this node.

path.description: Gets the path of the JSON token.

previous.description: Gets the previous sibling token of this node.

root.description: Gets the root JToken of this JToken.

type.description: Gets the node type for this JToken.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who created the config.

createdOn.description: Gets or sets the time when config was created.

endpointType.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier of this field

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity who modified the config.

modifiedOn.description: Gets or sets the time when variable group was modified

endpointType.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

RefreshAuthenticationParameters.description: Specify the properties for refreshing the endpoint authentication object being queried

endpointId.description: EndpointId which needs new authentication params

scope.description: Scope of the token requested. For GitHub marketplace apps, scope contains repository Ids

tokenValidityInMinutes.description: The requested endpoint authentication should be valid for _ minutes. Authentication params will not be refreshed if the token contained in endpoint already has active token.

ResultTransformationDetails.description: Represents template to transform the result data.

callbackContextTemplate.description: Gets or sets the template for callback parameters

callbackRequiredTemplate.description: Gets or sets the template to decide whether to callback or not

resultTemplate.description: Gets or sets the template for result transformation.

ServiceEndpoint.description: Represents an endpoint which may be used by an orchestration job.

authorization.description: Gets or sets the authorization data for talking to the endpoint.

createdBy.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the user who created the Service endpoint.

creationDate.description: Gets or sets the date, when the Service endpoint has been created.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of endpoint.

id.description: Gets or sets the identifier of this endpoint.

isDisabled.description: Whether service endpoint is disabled or not.

isOutdated.description: Indicates whether service endpoint is outdated or not.

isShared.description: Indicates whether service endpoint is shared with other projects or not.

modificationDate.description: Gets or sets the date, when the Service endpoint has been modified.

modifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the user who did the latest modification of the Service endpoint.

name.description: Gets the project-specific friendly name of the endpoint, as defined in the name field of ServiceEndpointProjectReferences.

operationStatus.description: Error message during creation/deletion of endpoint

owner.description: Owner of the endpoint Supported values are "library", "agentcloud"

readersGroup.description: Gets or sets the identity reference for the readers group of the service endpoint.

serviceEndpointProjectReferences.description: All other project references where the service endpoint is shared.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the endpoint.

url.description: Gets or sets the url of the endpoint.

ServiceEndpointAuthenticationScheme.description: Represents the authentication scheme used to authenticate the endpoint.

clientCertificates.description: Gets or sets the certificates of service endpoint authentication scheme.

dataSourceBindings.description: Gets or sets the data source bindings of the endpoint.

inputDescriptors.description: Gets or sets the input descriptors for the service endpoint authentication scheme.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of service endpoint authentication scheme.

requiresOAuth2Configuration.description: Gets or sets whether this auth scheme requires OAuth2 configuration or not.

scheme.description: Gets or sets the scheme for service endpoint authentication.

values.description: "Service endpoint request succeeded but with some issues.

serviceEndpointDetails.description: Gets or sets the service endpoint details for the service endpoint request.

ServiceEndpointRequestResult.description: Represents result of the service endpoint request.

activityId.description: Gets or sets the activity id of the service endpoint request result.

callbackContextParameters.description: Gets or sets the parameters used to make subsequent calls to the data source

callbackRequired.description: Gets or sets the flat that decides if another call to the data source is to be made

errorMessage.description: Gets or sets the error message of the service endpoint request result.

result.description: Gets or sets the result of service endpoint request.

authenticationSchemes.description: Authentication scheme of service endpoint type.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.serviceendpoint: Grants the ability to read service endpoints.
scopes.vso.serviceendpoint_manage: Grants the ability to read, query and manage service endpoints.
scopes.vso.serviceendpoint_query: Grants the ability to read and query service endpoints.
